content: As the cutscene sees you move toward the Stone Monkey, you'll be automatically thrown into a fight against it.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'The_Stone_Monkey.md', within the main section titled 'The Stone Monkey', specifically from the subsection 'Birthstone - Heart of Birthstone'.
The content is as follows:
As the cutscene sees you move toward the Stone Monkey, you'll be automatically thrown into a fight against it.
